title: My name is Đỗ Công Sơn I'm a front-end developer
description: As a final year student passionate about front-end development and UI/UX design, I leverage my skills to solve user interface challenges and craft exceptional user experiences. I am a dedicated learner, constantly expanding my knowledge of new technologies and best practices to enhance my abilities. My goal is to become a highly skilled software developer, creating innovative and efficient web and mobile applications.
